title: SKINS!!!!!
body: Should I get Nightblade Irelia or Order of the Locus? Which Kassadin skin is best? And which Diana skin looks better?

replies.body: The solution is always ... Big Booty Irelia (some weeaboos call it Frostblade Irelia btw)
Classic Diana would be my favourite if it weren't...classic.
Why about Frostblade Irelia? It's going on sale.

Order of the lotus

Harbinger Kassadin

Luna goddess diana
